Commands.Snatch: Adds target's BRV to ownRanged BRV attackCopies 1 buff from target at randomExtends copied buff duration by 1 turn
Commands.I don't need this: Transfers own debuffs to all targetsExtends transferred debuff duration by 1 turnSelf: 4 turns Phew, perfect!

Artifacts.Debuff Attack Up: Raises Attack by 5% while an enemy is debuffed.
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Mighty Snatch: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Snatch by 10%.
Artifacts.Bravery I don't need this: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using I don't need this.

Passives.Critical Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after inflicting a critical hit.
Passives.Snatch BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Snatch.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.I don't need this BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using I don't need this.
Passives.Snatch Charge: Increases the max uses of Snatch by 1.
Passives.I don't need this Charge: Increases the max uses of I don't need this by 1.
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage upon attacking an enemy that is not targeting the user.
Passives.Materia Hunter: Slightly raises Speed for 2 turns and grants a low probability of inflicting a Small Speed Down debuff for 2 turns, after a BRV Attack.

Weapons.Oritsuru CP: 15: Grants Small Max BRV Up for 1 turn.
Weapons.Wind Slash CP: 35: Increases the max uses of I don't need this by 1.Makes the debuff throwback affect all enemies.Extends all thrown debuffs' duration by 5 turns.Improves the effects of "Now it's perfect!" and extends its duration to 8 turns.Raises BRV based on Max BRV.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ while "Now it's perfect!" is active.
